France, has the love of cats
spread to the US aerospace agency
Nasa when the latest signal sent back from the
satellite is a video about cats on Earth?
In fact, this is a
serious experiment with the ambition that in the
future all space communications will come
from taz
encoded in a 15-second
ultra-high quality video of a tabby cat
mesmerizingly chasing dots.
This video is
part of an experiment called
Deep Space Optical Communications, in which
Nasa beams encoded laser beams along
with test data from nearly 16
million kilometers away from the spacecraft.  in space
the images will then reach the
pig telescope at the Paloma Observatory in San Diego,
California. This success is an important stepping stone
toward increasing the amount of
data that can be transmitted throughout the solar system
while also creating  cushion for future
achievements in space exploration
